scenes.background: [Monica] and [Bob] are trying to work with your previous feedback, but they seem stuck again.
scenes.description: 'We appreciate the feedback, but we're still hitting roadblocks. Can you help us troubleshoot?'

options.text: I'll help you troubleshoot, but I'll need to keep it brief.
options.analysis: You offered to help while reminding them of your need for brevity, showing good perception and empathy but slightly lower self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: I can provide a quick overview of potential solutions, but I can't stay long.
options.analysis: You balanced your time off with a willingness to help, showing good self-regulation, but your motivation and empathy were not particularly high.

options.text: I've given you enough to work with. Try to solve it based on the feedback.
options.analysis: You showed strong self-regulation by maintaining your boundaries, but your perception, empathy, and motivation to help were lower.
